I have come across a site that seems to cause Heritrix to hang.  The
site actually doesn't seem to exist but it never times out.  The site
is http://www.suntrustpayrollcard.com .  I get no error or anything,
basically nothing happens and it doesn't quit.  Feel free to try it on
this site.  Many Thanks.

~chris
